Verses: 1 erusalemilirundhu Vandha Pariseyarum, Vedhapaaragaril Silarum Avaridaththil Koodivandhaargal.
2 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Seesharil Silar Kazhuvaadha Asuththa Kaigalaale Pojanampannugiradhai Avargal Kandu Kutrampidiththaargal.
3 enenil Pariseyar Mudhaliya Yoodhar Anaivarum Munnorgalin Paarampariyaththaik Kaikkondu, Adikkadi Kaikazhuvinaalozhiya Saappidamaattaargal.

4 kadaiyilirundhu Varumpodhum Snaanampannaamal Saappidamaattaargal. Appadiye Sembugalaiyum Kinnangalaiyum Seppukkudangalaiyum Manaigalaiyum Kazhuvugiradhumallaamal, Veru Anega Aasaarangalaiyum Kaikkonduvaruvaargal.
5 appozhudhu, Andhap Pariseyarum Vedhapaaragarum Avarai Nokki: Ummudaiya Seeshargal Munnorgalin Paarampariyaththai Meeri En Kai Kazhuvaamal Saappidugiraargal Endru Kettaargal.
6 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Indha Janangal Thangal Udhadugalinaal Ennaik Ganampannugiraargal; Avargal Irudhayamo Enakkuth Dhooramaai Vilagiyirukkiradhu Endrum,

7 manusharudaiya Karpanaigalai Ubadhesangalaagap Podhiththu, Veenaai Enakku Aaraadhanai Seygiraargal Endrum, Ezhudhiyirukkirapiragaaram, Maayakkaararaagiya Ungalaik Kuriththu, Esaayaa Nandraaith Theerkkadharisanam Solliyirukkiraan.

8 neengal Thevanudaiya Kattalaiyaith Thallivittu, Manusharudaiya Paarambariyaththaik Kaikkonduvarugiravargalaai, Kinnangalaiyum Sembugalaiyum Kazhuvugireergal; Matrum Ippadippatta Anega Sadangugalaiyum Anusariththu Varugireergal Endraar.
9 pinnum Avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ungal Paarambariyaththaik Kaikkollumpadikkuth Dhevanudaiya Kattalaigalai Viyarththamaakkinadhu Nandraayirukkiradhu.
10 eppadiyenil, Un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Ganampannuvaayaaga Endrum, Thagappanaiyaavadhu Thaayaiyaavadhu Nindhikkiravan Kollappadavendum Endrum, Mose Solliyirukkiraare.

11 neengalo, Oruvan Than Thagappanaiyaavadhu Thaayaiyaavadhu Nokki: Unakku Naan Seyyaththakka Udhavi Edhu Undo, Adhaik Korpaan Ennum Kaanikkaiyaagak Kodukkiren Endru Sollivittaal Avanudaiya Kadamai Theerndhadhu Endru Solli,
12 avanai Ini Than Thagappanukkaavadhu Than Thaaikkaavadhu Yaadhoru Udhaviyum Seyya Ottaamal;
13 neengal Podhiththa Ungal Paarambariyaththinaal Dheva Vasanaththai Avamaakkugireergal. Idhupolave Neengal Matrum Anega Kaariyangalaiyum Seygireergal Endru Sonnaar.
14 pinbu Avar Janangalellaaraiyum Varavazhaiththu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ellaarum Enakku Sevikoduththu Unarungal.
15 manushanukkup Purambe Irundhu Avanukkulle Pogiradhondrum Avanaith Theettuppaduththamaattaadhu; Avan Ullaththilirundhu Purappadugiravaigale Avanaith Theettuppaduththum.
16 ketkiradharku Oruvan Kaadhullavanaayirundhaal Ketkakkadavan Endraar.
17 avar Janangalai Vittu Veettukkul Piravesiththapodhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avar Sonna Uvamaiyaikkuriththu Avaridaththil Visaariththaargal.
18 adharku Avar: Neengalum Ivvalavu Unarvillaadhavargalaa? Purambeyirundhu Manushanukkulle Pogiradhondrum Avanaith Theettuppaduththamaattaadhendru Neengal Arindhukollavillaiyaa?
19 adhu Avan Irudhayaththil Pogaamal Vayitrile Pogiradhu; Adhilirundhu Ellaap Pojanangalin Asuththangalaiyum Kazhikkira Aasanavazhiyaai Neengippogum.
20 manushanukkulle Irundhu Purappadugiradhe Manushanaith Theettuppaduththum.
21 eppadiyenil, Manusharudaiya Irudhayaththirkullirundhu Pollaadha Sindhanaigalum, Vibasaarangalum, Vesiththanangalum, Kolaipaadhagangalum,
22 kalavugalum, Porulaasaigalum, Thushtaththanangalum, Kabadum, Kaamavigaaramum, Vankannum, Dhooshanamum, Perumaiyum, Madhikedum Purappattuvarum.
23 pollaangaanavaigalaagiya Ivaigalellaam Ullaththilirundhu Purappattu Manushanaith Theettuppaduththum Endraar.

24 pinbu, Avar Ezhundhu Avvidam Vittup Purappattu, Theeru Seedhon Pattanangalin Ellaigalil Poi, Oru Veettukkul Piravesiththu, Oruvarum Adhai Ariyaadhirukka Virumbiyum, Avar Maraivaayirukkak Koodaamarpoyitru.
25 asuththa Aavipidiththirundha Oru Sirupennin Thaayaagiya Oru Sthiree Avaraikkuriththuk Kelvippattu, Vandhu Avar Paadhaththil Vizhundhaal.
26 andha Sthiree Seeropenikkiyaa Dhesaththaalaagiya Girekka Sthireeyaayirundhaal; Aval Than Magalaip Pidiththirundha Pisaasaith Thuraththividavendumendru Avarai Vendikkondaal.
27 yesu Avalai Nokki: Mundhip Pillaigal Thirupthiyadaiyattum; Pillaigalin Appaththai Eduththu, Naaikkuttigalukkup Podugiradhu Nalladhalla Endraar.
28 adharku Aval: Meydhaan Aandavare, Aagilum Mejaiyin Keezhirukkum Naaikkuttigal Pillaigal Sindhugira Thunikkaigalaith Thinnume Endraal.
29 appozhudhu, Avar: Nee Sonna Andha Vaarththaiyinimiththam Pogalaam. Pisaasu Un Magalai Vittu Neengippoyitru Endraar.
30 aval Than Veettukku Vandhapozhudhu, Pisaasu Poi Vittadhaiyum, Than Magal Kattilil Paduththirukkiradhaiyum Kandaal.
31 marupadiyum, Avar Theeru Seedhon Pattanangalin Ellaigalai Vittup Purappattu, Thekkappoliyin Ellaigalin Vazhiyaaik Galileyaak Kadalaruge Vandhaar.
32 ange Konnaivaayudaiya Oru Sevidanai Avaridaththil Konduvandhu, Avar Thamadhu Kaiyai Avanmel Vaikkumpadi Vendikkondaargal.
33 appozhudhu, Avar Avanai Janakkoottaththai Vittuth Thaniye Azhaiththukkondupoi, Thammudaiya Viralgalai Avan Kaadhugalil Vaiththu, Umizhndhu, Avanudaiya Naavaiththottu;
34 vaanaththai Annaandhu Paarththu, Perumoochchuvittu: Eppaththaa Endraar. Adharkuth Thirakkappaduvaayaaga Endru Arththamaam.
35 udane Avanudaiya Sevigal Thirakkappattu, Avanudaiya Naavin Kattum Avizhndhu, Avan Sevvaiyaaip Pesinaan.
36 adhai Oruvarukkum Sollavendaamendru Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittaar; Aagilum Evvalavu Adhigamaai Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittaaro, Avvalavu Adhigamaai Avargal Adhaip Pirasiththampanni,
37 ellaavatraiyum Nandraai Seydhaar; Sevidar Ketkavum, Oomaiyar Pesavumpannugiraar Endru Solli, Menmelum Aachchariyappattaargal.
